parameters.description: The system sampling rate in Hz.
parameters.name: SampleRate

parameters.description: The system sampling rate in Hz.
parameters.name: SampleRate

LogicalEntities.description: PICMG Profiled Motion Controller - Closed Loop (servo)

io_bindings.description: optional motor brake output from the controller, active high
io_bindings.name: BrakeEffecter

parameters.description: The system sampling rate in Hz.
parameters.name: SampleRate

parameters.description: The velocity feed forward gain.  This should be set close to the coefficient of viscous friction for the motor normalized to device units.
parameters.name: VelocityFFGain

parameters.description: The maximum allowed setpoint (velocity) of the motor expressed in device units per sample period.  This is used by the position loop limiter to make sure that velocities over the limit are not requested.  If this value is set to 0, the limiter will not be used.
parameters.name: PositionLoopLimit

parameters.description: The proportional gain for the position loop
parameters.name: PositionProportionalGain

parameters.description: The integral gain for the velocity loop
parameters.name: VelocityIntegralGain

parameters.description: The differential gain for the velocity loop
parameters.name: VelocityDifferentialGain

parameters.description: The proportional gain for the velocity loop
parameters.name: VelocityProportionalGain

parameters.description: Control signal scaling factor – adjusts Torque command to proper range for DAC output.
parameters.name: OutputGain

parameters.description: System time constant – time to wait between profile generator reaching final position and when the controller registers as done
parameters.name: DoneTimeConstant

parameters.description: Action to take when in the “Done” motion state.  Valid values are “brake” (apply mechanical brake), “hold” (hold the position using the motion controller), and “coast” (motion control is deactivated).
parameters.name: OutputInDone

parameters.description: Action to take when in the 'Idle' and 'Waiting' motion states.  Valid values are 'brake' (apply mechanical brake), 'hold' (hold the position using the motion controller), and “coast” (motion control is deactivated).
parameters.name: OutputInIdle

parameters.description: Action to take when in the “ConditionStop” motion state.  Valid values are “brake” (apply mechanical brake), “hold” (hold the position using the motion controller), and “coast” (motion control is deactivated).
parameters.name: OutputInConditionStop

parameters.description: Action to take when in the “ErrorStop” motion state.  Valid values are “brake” (apply mechanical brake), “hold” (hold the position using the motion controller), and “coast” (motion control is deactivated).
parameters.name: OutputInErrorStop
